name: Practice Dual Blade new combo

tasks.task name: Practice the new combo in the training area
Practice the new combo during an easy mission (No hunting mission)
Practice new combo with Large Monster

results: New weapon to main during hunts

name: Farm Magnamalo Materials for armor
objective: Gather Magnamalo materials, especifically rare ones

tasks.task name: Get 10 Magnamalo Speartail
Get 3 Purple Magna Orbs
Get 1 Magnamalo Orb

results: You're now able to craft the Magnamalo armor

name: Beat Crimson Glow Valstrax 10 times without dying once
description: Beat CG Valstrax without dying and don't use outside help
objective: Get better understanding of the monster's attack pattern

tasks.task name: Break Valstrax tail 3 times during the same mission
Break Valstrax head 3 times during different missions
Complete a mission without getting hit

results: Now you can do CG Valstrax in G rank missions

name: Play with Juliette until you get better at using her
description: Use Juliette to get used to OS mechanics
objective: Get a better understanding of how to play the game

tasks.task name: Play 3 matches with bots
Play 3 online matches with friends

results: You can now play with Juliette better

name: Test AI.Mi as a Goalie
description: Use AI.Mi moveset and test it out as a goal keeper
objective: Get a better understanding of character's set

tasks.task name: Play 3 matches with bots
Play 3 online matches with friends

results: You can now play with AI.Mi better

name: Test Atlas as a striker
description: Use Atlas moveset and test how it works as a striker
objective: Get a better understanding of character's set

tasks.task name: Play 3 online matches with friends
Play 3 online matches with friends

results: You can now play with Atlas better

name: Main Snow
description: Test Snow's moveset and play with him in online battles
objective: Get a better understanding of how to use Snow

tasks.task name: Play 3 online matches with friends
Play 5 online matches with strangers and get MVP

results: You can now play with Snow better

name: Main Master Cat

tasks.task name: Play 3 online matches with friends
Play 5 online matches with strangers and get MVP

results: You can now play with Master Cat better

name: Main Ducky&Swan

tasks.task name: Play 3 online matches with friends
Play 5 online matches with strangers and get MVP

results: You can now play with Ducky&Swan

name: Get a shiny Quaxly
description: Use Masuda Method to get shiny Quaxly

tasks.task name: Get a Ditto with different nationality via trade
Make a sandwich with Egg Power lvl 2

results: You should get a shiny Quaxly in the next 4 weeks if you're lucky lol if not, try again

name: Build Walking Wake counter for tera raids
description: Find info about WW possible counters and build it for tera raids
objective: Get a Pokemon that can solo WW without the need of online help

tasks.task name: Find/train an Azumarill
Get Azumarill the proper moveset for the raid
Change Azumarill's nature into one that will boost the proper stat
Mock-test it during a solo WW raid

results: Azumarill should be able to beat it following the designated steps according to guides

name: Build a Meowscarada for competitive
description: Build Meowscarada to use in competitive play
objective: Get a decent pokemon to fight in tournaments

tasks.task name: Get a 6IV Sprigatito
Build the ideal moveset/nature according to guides
Use it during a battle with a friend

results: New pokemon to use in competitive
